summary: Culinary professional trained at Le Cordon Bleu with experience in French cuisine, pasta production, and high-volume kitchen operations. Skilled in menu development, cost control, inventory, and staff management; specializes in handmade pastas and fabricating proteins. Currently running the kitchen at Citizen in Beverly Hills.
skills: Focus on portion and cost control

experience.title: Chef De Cuisine
experience.description: Developed seasonal menu; Maintained quality of food while constantly keeping a low food cost; In charge of inventory/ordering; Responsible for hiring and firing of employees; Trained all new employees to uphold our standards.

experience.title: Chef de Cuisine
experience.description: Assisted in seasonal menu development. In charge of inventory/ordering. Fabricating proteins. Handmade pastas daily.

experience.title: Sous Chef
experience.description: Ran lunch service and Worked all stations for dinner in busy 300-400-person restaurant. In charge of inventory and ordering. Responsible for fabricating all proteins.

education.school: Le Cordon Bleu College of Culinary Arts, Pasadena, CA
